remarks: A pairwise intersection of interiors is the interior of the intersection.  This does not always hold for arbitrary intersections. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 31-Aug-2009.)
statement:
clscld.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
ntrin $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ A C_ X /\ B C_ X ) -> ( ( int ` J ) ` ( A i^i B ) ) = ( ( ( int ` J ) ` A ) i^i ( ( int ` J ) ` B ) ) ) $.
